sentences.en: Okay, this hankie is very nearIy cIean. I'm going to dab you.
sentences.cn: 好的, 这手绢很干净. 我会给你轻轻擦的.

sentences.en: Some try their best to comfort you, hand you a tissue or hankie, trying to soothe you with some soft words. But then there are some who will hold you and hug you.
sentences.cn: 一引起人尽量地安慰你，递给你一张纸巾或一块手帕，并且尽量和你说些宽慰的话。

sentences.en: The Operatic Bow Same as above, only with a giant hankie in your right hand to wipe the sweat off your forehead after the exertion of returning to the vertical.
sentences.cn: 同上，只不过右手拿一个大手帕，努力站直的时候好擦前额的汗。 （译注：演完歌剧后要长时间谢幕。）
